app_name.description: This is the name of the extension, the placeholder $APPNAME$ is used the remaining strings.

app_slogan.message: Correos electrónicos Markdown para Mozilla Thunderbird

toggle_button_tooltip_enable.message: Activar la vista previa de marcado
toggle_button_tooltip_enable.description: text shown when user hovers mouse over Markdown Toggle button

toggle_button_tooltip_disable.description: text shown when user hovers mouse over Markdown Toggle button

upgrade_notification_text.description: Text on the notification shown when Markdown Here has been updated

forgot_to_render_back_button.description: Text on the Back (cancel) button of the prompt that's shown when it's detected that a user may have forgotten to render the Markdown in their email

forgot_to_render_prompt_close_hover.description: Text that shows when the user hovers over the 'X' that will close the prompt

forgot_to_render_prompt_info.message: Parece que escribiste este correo electrónico en Markdown pero olvidaste hacerlo bonito.
forgot_to_render_prompt_info.description: Informational part of the prompt that's shown when it's detected that a user may have forgotten to render the Markdown in their email

forgot_to_render_prompt_question.description: Question part of the prompt that's shown when it's detected that a user may have forgotten to render the Markdown in their email

forgot_to_render_send_button.description: Text on the Send (continue) button of the prompt that's shown when it's detected that a user may have forgotten to render the Markdown in their email

set_math_api_url.message: Establecer una URL de API para renderizar matemáticas en Configuración.
set_math_api_url.description: A message displayed when math rendering is set to use Gchart but an invalid URL is set.

__WET_GROUP__settings.message: Páginas de configuración de la extensión

options_page__interface_mode.description: Label for selecting the user interface mode (eg. modern or classic modes)

options_page__mdhr_modern_mode.message: Usar el modo de vista previa en vivo (moderno)

options_page__forgot_to_render_label2.message: Permitir el cheque olvidado a la lista
options_page__forgot_to_render_label2.description: Label for the checkbox that enables the forgot-to-render feature

options_page__forgot_to_render_2.message:
Cuando envías un correo electrónico, esto verifica el contenido para ver si parece que lo escribiste en Markdown,
pero se olvidó de renderizar (es decir, haga clic en 'Markdown Toggle') antes de enviar.
Esto puede necesitar ser deshabilitado si interfiere con su capacidad de enviar correo electrónico.

options_page__composer_start_markdown_mo.message: Compositor de inicio en modo marcado

options_page__features_title.description: Heading for a set of options to enable or disable various features of the Markdown rendering

options_page__gfm_line_breaks_enabled_la.description: Label for the checkbox that enables the support of 'Github-flavored Markdown' line breaks.

options_page__smart_replacements_enabled.description: Label for enabling the smart replacements feature

options_page__smart_replacements_2.message: Los reemplazos inteligentes incluyen: citas de unicodo, en- y em-dash, elipses y reemplazos de flechas
options_page__smart_replacements_2.description: An explanation of what smart replacements are

options_page__emoji_autocomplete_enabled.description: Label for enabling an auto-complete popup for emoji shortcodes

options_page__hotkey_title.message: Combinación de teclas (también conocido como atajo de teclado)

options_page__tex_math_title.message: Soporte a fórmulas matemáticas en TeX

options_page__tex_math_texzilla_label.message: TeXZilla y renderización de lienzos HTML
options_page__tex_math_texzilla_label.description: Label for tex math rendering option

options_page__tex_math_texzilla_label-Ti.message: Las fórmulas de matemáticas se renderizan con TeXZilla.js utilizando el lienzo del navegador. No se envía ninguna solicitud de red.
options_page__tex_math_texzilla_label-Ti.description: description how math is rendered when TexZilla option is selected

options_page__tex_math_gchart_label.message: Rendición de matemáticas utilizando Google Chart API (deprected)
options_page__tex_math_gchart_label.description: Label for GChart math rendering option

options_page__tex_math_gchart_label-Titl.message: Para generar la imagen de la fórmula, se envía una solicitud a Google. Eso significa que estás compartiendo tu fórmula con Google. También significa que los destinatarios de tu mensaje estarán haciendo una petición a Google para tener la imagen renderizada.
options_page__tex_math_gchart_label-Titl.description: one of the TeX math privacy concerns

options_page__tex_math_gchart_discontinu.message: Google Image Chart API se suspende.
options_page__tex_math_gchart_discontinu.description: Information about the discontinued GChart Image API formerly used to render math formula.

options_page__start_new_message_toggle.message: Iniciar un nuevo mensaje de correo electrónico. Toggle the composer to markdown mode with the action button on the format toolbar.

options_page__type_some_markdown.message: Escribe algo de Markdown en el correo electrónico. Try this:

options_page__compose_live_preview.message: Las actualizaciones de la vista previa en vivo mientras escribes tu mensaje.

options_page__toggle_hotkey.description: A step suggestion in the basic usage instructions

options_page__syntax_highlighting_theme_.description: label for the syntax highlighting theme combo box

options_page__preview_title.description: section title for the Markdown preview section

options_page__create_gitlab_issue.description: Text linking to Gitlab issue creation page

options_page__issue_debug_info.message: Se puede utilizar la siguiente información de depuración:
options_page__issue_debug_info.description: header for some extension debug information

options_page__debug_copy_clipboard.description: button for copying debug information to the clipboard

options_page__translate.description: Used in a link to open Locale Maker

options_page__localemaker_1.message: Locale Maker es copiado abiertamente de la extensión FireMonkey para Firefox.

options_page__localemaker_2.message: Gracias al erosman por su creación.

options_page__changes_saved.description: message that shows when user changes have been saved

options_page__invalid_hotkey.description: message that shows when an invalid hotkey combination was entered

options_page__reset_button.description: used for resetting certain options to the default
